definitions.title: demonstr. pr. comm.
definitions.body: this (Zinj. [[זן]], [[זנה]]; Eg. Aram. [[זנה]] (S-C: Pap. B 17 +); [[זנך]] (ib.:C 6, D 8); Nab. Palm. [[דנה]] (Lzb:264 Cooke:26); Targum [[דֵּין]] (e.g. 1Sa 10:27) and (with [[הָ]], i.e. [[הָא]], ho0 ecce) [[הָדֵתן]]; Aram. of Têma [[הא זא]] (Cooke:195. 198); Syr. hoono0 (contr. for [[הָֽדְנׇא]]); Mand. [[האזין]]; Sab. d-n (Hom:Chrest. 13); Eth. zntu: all from [[[דֶּה]],] [[זה]], + demonstr. n. (W:CG 108 f.); fem. BAram. [[דָּא]], Targum [[דָּא]], [[הָדה]], Syr. hodeyn, Mand. [[האזא]], Eth. z4ti: without the n; the pl. is [[אִלֵּין]], q. v.);—this:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: Da 2:18 [[רָזׇא דְנׇה]] this secret, v:Da 2:28, v:Da 2:29, v:Da 2:30 +, Ezr 4:11, Ezr 5:3, Ezr 5:4, Ezr 5:9 +; [[כָּל־דְּנׇה]] Da 5:22.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: [[אַחֲרֵי דְנׇה]] after this †Da 2:29, Da 2:45; so [[בָּאתַר דְּנׇה]] † Da 7:6, Da 7:7.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: [[כִּדְנׇה]] like this, thus, † Je 10:10 (= Heb. [[כּׂה]]), Da 2:10 [[מִלְּתָא כִדְנׇה]] a word like this (cf. [[כָּזׁאת]] Es 4:14), Da 3:29, Ezr 5:7.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: [[עַל־דְּנׇה]] on account of this †Da 3:16, Ezr 4:22, Ezr 5:5, Ezr 5:17, Ezr 6:11; as conj. = therefore (cf. Heb. [[עַל־זׁאת]]) Ezr 4:14, Ezr 4:15.—Vid. also [[קֳבֵלַ]] and [[קַדְמָה]]. p. 1080
